content: diane s diagonal scarf designed by diane l augustin yarn happy ✻ bead happy materials size 8 needles 1 skein of noro taiyo yarn or any worsted weight self-striping yarn such as crystal palace mochi plus you will need approximately 200 yards finished size 4 inches wide by 64 inches long it is a garter stitch scarf which will have diagonal pointed ends this easy pattern will give you fantastic results when you try it with the huge variety of gorgeous self-striping yarn available these three scarves were all made with noro taiyo one skein is approximately 200 meters pattern co 27 stitches using the long tail cast on row 1 and all odd row knit the first two stitches together continue knitting until the last stitch knit into the front and back of the last stitch row 2 and all even row knit enjoy bind off at desired length
